mapper.insert: insert into Patient(id, name, sex, birthdate, password) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{birthdate}, #{password})
mapper.update: update Patient set name = #{name}, sex = #{sex}, birthdate = #{birthdate}, password = #{password} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, name, sex, birthdate, password from Patient where id = #{id}
select id, name, sex, birthdate, password from Patient where id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
select id, name, sex, birthdate, password from patient limit #{start}, #{size}
select id, name, sex, birthdate, password from Patient where id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') limit #{page.start}, #{page.size}
